description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Manticores:
Enemies have 5% less {STAT_attack} and your creatures have 15% more {STAT_attack} and {STAT_defense} for each {RACE_Manticore} fighting on your side. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Manticore
